alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 12:24PM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches above 6000 feet...and 4 to 8 inches above 8000 feet. Winds gusting 50 mph to 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerous road conditions with icy and snowpacked roads likely. Very strong winds could cause low visibility in blowing and drifting snow along with dangerously cold wind chills.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
